类的使用
Object.Aircraft

  • 使用Aircraft的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    Controller  
    ControlLogic  
    Object  

    • Controller中Aircraft的使用

      类型参数类型为Aircraft的Controller中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static java.util.ArrayList<Aircraft> GameWindowController.Aircrafts
      list of aircrafts and the list used for count kills of player
      static java.util.ArrayList<Aircraft> GameWindowController.Kills 

    • ControlLogic中Aircraft的使用

      声明为Aircraft的ControlLogic中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected Aircraft ControlLogic.MyAircraft
      Attributes for ControlLogic DetectRange is the visual limit of a pilot, is defined to be 3000 CommandOrder is used to control Command guide missles
      private Aircraft AIControl.TargetAircraft 
      返回Aircraft的ControlLogic中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Aircraft ControlLogic.getMyAircraft() 
      Aircraft AIControl.getTargetAircraft() 
      参数类型为Aircraft的ControlLogic中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static void TacticsLogic.AutoCommand(Aircraft aircraft, Object target)
      this procedure is used set Command order to guide missles which have command guide function by AI
      static void TacticsLogic.AutoHeadTurning(Aircraft aircraft, Object target)
      this procedure is turn the helmet aimer by AI
      static boolean TacticsLogic.AvoidCrash(Aircraft aircraft)
      this procedure is used to prevent the aircraft from crashed on the ground it will return true and excute the procedure when aircraft is below 2000 and continues going down
      static ExternalLoad TacticsLogic.ChooseMinRangeWeapon(Aircraft aircraft, Object target)
      this procedure is used to choose a proper weapon to use the best weapon is the weapon whose envelop covered the target and has the min lauch range
      void PlayerControl.Observe(Aircraft aircraft)
      Observe an aircraft and check whether it can be indicated Tagert should be within the range of 3000
      void ControlLogic.Observe(Aircraft aircraf) 
      void AIControl.Observe(Aircraft aircraft)
      Observe an aircraft and check whether it can be the target Tagert should be within the range of 3000 or detected by radar, also it should be an enemy not friend The closest target is prior to others
      void ControlLogic.setMyAircraft(Aircraft myAircraft) 
      void AIControl.setTargetAircraft(Aircraft targetAircraft)
